trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for the server channel sink provider that creates <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'implementazione per il server di provider di sink di canale che crea <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink"> </xref> istanze.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink> is used to create Web Services Description Language (WSDL) schema in situations where the URL ends with the string "?wsdl", for example, http://localhost/longbeard?wsdl.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink>viene utilizzato per creare uno schema di servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) in cui l'URL termina con la stringa "? wsdl", ad esempio http://localhost/longbeard?wsdl.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSinkProvider"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSinkProvider"> </xref> classe con i valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSinkProvider"></xref> class with specified properties and provider data.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSinkProvider"> </xref> classe con le proprietà specificate e i dati del provider.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of configuration properties to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>delle proprietà di configurazione da utilizzare con la nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> instances to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryServerFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"> </xref> istanze da usare con la nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryServerFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The channel for which to create the channel sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Il canale per il quale creare la catena di sink di canale.

trans-unit.source: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Il primo sink della catena di sink di canale appena creato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the channel data for the channel that the current sink is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i dati di canale per il canale associato al sink corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelDataStore"></xref> object in which the channel data is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelDataStore"> </xref> oggetto in cui i dati di canale da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto successivo <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"> </xref> nella catena di provider di sink.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: Alla successiva <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"> </xref> nella catena di provider di sink.
